thread.title: Chaffetz, Cummings request Flynn documents from White House
thread.title_full: Chaffetz, Cummings request Flynn documents from White House

author: awright@politico.com (Austin Wright)
title: Chaffetz, Cummings request Flynn documents from White House
text:
Reps. Elijah Cummings (D-Md.) and Jason Chaffetz (R-Utah) sent letters requesting Michael Flynn's security clearance applications. | Getty Chaffetz, Cummings request Flynn documents from White House Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
“The Republican chairman of the House Oversight Committee is joining his Democratic counterpart in demanding that the White House turn over former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn’s security clearance applications. 
Reps. Jason Chaffetz (R-Utah) and Elijah Cummings (D-Md.) sent letters Wednesday requesting information on Flynn from the White House, FBI, Defense Department and the director of national intelligence. Story Continued Below 
Cummings originally requested some of the information last week after obtaining documents showing Flynn was paid nearly $34,000 for a speech he gave in 2015 in Moscow celebrating the Russian propaganda outlet RT. 
Chaffetz and Cummings are trying to figure out, among other things, if Flynn disclosed this payment when he applied for a security clearance to be Trump’s national security adviser. Flynn resigned from the post last month after it became clear he misled his colleagues about his pre-inauguration phone calls with Russia’s ambassador. POLITICO Huddle 
A preview of the day's congressional news — in your inbox. Email Sign Up By signing up you agree to receive email newsletters or alerts from POLITICO. You can unsubscribe at any time. 
The House oversight panel is asking for the documents by April 3. 
Chaffetz and Cummings are requesting “that each agency produce documents relating to Flynn’s foreign contacts and payments, security clearance applications, and other related documents between the time of his retirement in 2014 to present day,” according to a committee statement.
